title: Sir Tom Jones Warns About Fake Profiles
summary: Sir Tom Jones is a famous singer who has told his fans about a bad scam. People are making fake social media profiles that pretend to be him. These fake profiles try to trick fans into talking to them and might try to take their money. Sir Tom says he never talks to people privately on social media. He wants everyone to be careful online and to report and block any fake profiles they see. This is sad because scammers are trying to hurt vulnerable people. It is important to stay safe and not trust strangers online.

background_read: Sir Tom Jones is a famous singer from Wales who has been singing for many years. He is known for songs like 'It's Not Unusual'. Social media is a place online where people can share pictures and messages. Scams are bad tricks where people lie to take money or personal information. It is important to be careful and not trust everyone you meet online.
Article_Structure: WHO: Sir Tom Jones, a famous singer
WHAT: He warns about fake social media profiles that impersonate him to scam fans
WHERE: On social media platforms like Instagram
WHY: To protect vulnerable people from being tricked and abused by scammers

perspectives.description: Sir Tom Jones emphasizes the importance of online safety and protecting fans from scams.
